inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getService.

namespaceId.description: ID of the namespace that the service belongs to.

tags.description: Map of tags to assign to the service. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: (**Deprecated**) Map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getService.

dnsConfigs.description: Complex type that contains information about the resource record sets that you want Amazon Route 53 to create when you register an instance.

healthCheckConfigs.description: Complex type that contains settings for an optional health check. Only for Public DNS namespaces.

healthCheckCustomConfigs.description: A complex type that contains settings for ECS managed health checks.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

namespaceId.description: ID of the namespace to use for DNS configuration.

tags.description: Map of tags to assign to the service. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: (**Deprecated**) Map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.
